name: Tutorial 1 - Inventory
description:
Everyone just woke up... We need to be sure everything is still in order
(Move cards in the choice to fulfill the requirement)

name: Tutorial 2 - Main engine
description:
We are currently running on the auxilliary engine, we need to restart the main one
(You can either use a card having repair skill, or 3 others cards)

name: Tutorial 3 - Trouble
description:
Everyone is still a bit confused by what is happening, we need a way to rally everyone
(No need to fulfill all requirement, doing a choice will make you loose sanity in the opposing faction, the default one will make you loose sanity randomly)

choices.description: We need to enforce the rules
